title.value: Динамика роста отдельных мышц у ягнят разного происхождения
Dynamics of growth of separate muscles at lambs of a different origin
Dynamics of growth of separate muscles at lambs of a different origin

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Shatskij, A.D., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented data on the dynamics of growth of individual muscles studying at birth, 3.5 and 7.5 months of lambs of breeds Prekos, Romanov, hybrids of the first generation in variants Prekos x Romanov and Romanov x Prekos. Researches were realized at the enterprise 'Budagovo' in the Minsk area (Belarus) and in laboratories of sheep breeding of the Scientific and Practical Center for Animal Breeding. It was found that the growth of muscle groups on the anatomical areas affected breed and age of lambs. The intensity of the muscle growth is predetermined by the location, functional purpose, and genotype-programmed rhythms of growth.
